So I am just curious.. for the people that actually got this game to work, and didn't automatically get the 'has stopped working' message, do you use steam?  I'm wondering if this could be part of the problem...

Eor in regards to: no i dont use steam. i simply installed it and copied the crack files over and it works perfectly.

i also have no lag whatsoever at max settings. i can only assume the people complaining have low quality computers for gaming.

I think you're missing the point of what I am saying.. first off, my computer specs are far from top notch, but they more than match what is needed for this game, as per my previous post if you look back a bit.  Secondly, what I was trying to say, is that the crack seems to be causing a problem for those of us that DO have Steam already installed on our PC's.  So I guess I was wondering if anyone that has steam installed is able to play this game, and if so, what are your PC specs and what did you have to do to make it work if anything?  Thanks!
